original_dialogue.doctor: Ok, this means you might be having Esophagitis.

gpt3_output.doctor: It sounds like you may be suffering from a stomach virus or food poisoning. I recommend that you drink plenty of fluids and rest until your symptoms improve. If your diarrhea is severe or persists for more than a few days, you should see a doctor for further evaluation.

issue: GPT3 is able to directly identify the disease if multiple symptoms are provided in the prompt. It also further steps that the patient needs to take.
